component.name: CustomScene
component.script:
function init() m.RowList = m.top.FindNode("RowList") m.RowList.itemComponentName = "RowListItem" m.RowList.numRows = 3 m.RowList.itemSize = [230 * 3 + 20 * 2, 130] m.RowList.rowItemSize = [ [230, 130]] m.RowList.itemSpacing = [ 0, 80 ] m.RowList.rowItemSpacing = [ [20, 0] ] m.RowList.rowLabelOffset = [ [0, 30] ] m.RowList.rowCounterRightOffset = 3 m.RowList.rowFocusAnimationStyle = "fixedFocusWrap" m.RowList.vertFocusAnimationStyle = "FloatingFocus" m.RowList.showRowLabel = [true, true] m.RowList.content = GetRowListContent() m.RowList.visible = true m.RowList.SetFocus(true) m.RowList.ObserveField("rowItemFocused", "onRowItemFocused") m.RowList.observeField("itemSelected","playvideo") m.RowList.SetFocus(true) m.ItemVertical = m.top.FindNode("ItemVertical") m.video = m.top.findNode("Video") end function
function GetRowListContent() as object data = CreateObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode")
m.UrlTask = CreateObject("roSGNode", "UrlTransfer") m.UrlTask.control = "RUN" jsonContent = m.UrlTask.urlContent m.UrlTask.control = "STOP"
for each item in jsonContent row = data.CreateChild("ContentNode") row.title = item.name.original for each items in item.items item = row.CreateChild("RowListItemData") item.posterUrl = items.images[0].url item.videoUrl = items.video item.posterVerticalUrl= items.images[1].url end for end for m.RowList.content = data return data end function
function onRowItemFocused() as void maincontent = m.RowList.content.getChild(m.RowList.itemFocused) content = maincontent.getChild(m.RowList.itemFocused) print "111111111111111111111111111111" print content itemImagen = m.itemVertical.FindNode("itemImage") itemImagen.uri = content.posterVerticalUrl itemTitle = m.itemVertical.FindNode("itemTitle") itemTitle.text = "beIN SPORTS La Liga" itemDescription = m.itemVertical.FindNode("itemDescription") itemDescription.text = "Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry." videoContent = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode") videoContent.url = content.videoUrl videoContent.title = "Test Video" videoContent.streamformat = "hls" m.video.content = videoContent end function
sub playvideo() m.video.control = "play" m.video.visible = true m.video.setFocus(true) end sub
function onKeyEvent(key as String,press as Boolean) as Boolean if press then if key = "back" if (m.video.state = "playing") m.video.control = "stop" m.videolist.setFocus(true) m.video.visible = false
return true end if end if end if
return false end function
